role.name: OC0
role.desc: Output Compare Match Output. Pin can serve as an external output for timer 0 compare match.

role.name: OC2
role.desc: Timer/Counter2 output compare match output: The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter2 output compare. The OC2 pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: RXD1
role.desc: Receive Data (data input pin for the USART1). When the USART1 receiver is enabled, this pin is configured as an input. When the USART1 forces this pin to be an input, a logical state on PORT register will turn on the internal pull-up. Channel 1

role.name: AIN0
role.desc: Analog Comparator Positive Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the positive input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: TXD1
role.desc: Transmit Data (data output pin for the USART1). When the USART1 transmitter is enabled, this pin is configured as an output. Channel 1

role.name: AIN1
role.desc: Analog Comparator Negative Input. When configured as an input and with the internal MOS pull-up resistor switched off, this pin also serves as the negative input of the on-chip Analog Comparator.

role.name: /SS
role.desc: Slave Select pin for using with SPI.

role.name: OC3B
role.desc: Output compare matchB output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter3 output compareB. The OC3B pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: MOSI
role.desc: Data input pin for memory downloading or SPI.

role.name: MISO
role.desc: Data output pin for memory uploading or SPI.

role.name: SCK
role.desc: Clock input pin for memory up/downloading or SPI.

role.name: /RESET
role.desc: Reset pin for MCU, active at low.

role.name: RXD0
role.desc: Receive Data (data input pin for the USART0). When the USART0 receiver is enabled, this pin is configured as an input. When the USART0 forces this pin to be an input, a logical state on PORT register will turn on the internal pull-up. Channel 0

role.name: TXD0
role.desc: Transmit Data (data output pin for the USART0). When the USART0 transmitter is enabled, this pin is configured as an output. Channel 0

role.name: INT0
role.desc: External Interrupt source 0 to the MCU.

role.name: INT1
role.desc: External Interrupt source 1 to the MCU.

role.name: TOSC1
role.desc: Timer Oscillator pin 1 - clock source for asynchronous clocking of Timer/Counter2

role.name: OC3A
role.desc: Output compare matchA output: The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter3 output com-pareA. The OC3A pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: TOSC2
role.desc: Timer Oscillator pin 2 - clock source for asynchronous clocking of Timer/Counter2

role.name: OC1A
role.desc: Output compare matchA output: The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output com-pareA. The OC1A pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: /WR
role.desc: Write strobe signal for XRAM, active low

role.name: /RD
role.desc: Read strobe signal for XRAM, active low

role.name: XTAL2
role.desc: Pin for connecting external clock source (crystal, resonator..) for MCU (output)

role.name: XTAL1
role.desc: Pin for connecting external clock source (crystal, resonator..) for MCU (input)

role.name: TCK
role.desc: Test Clock. JTAG operation is synchronous to TCK.

role.name: TMS
role.desc: Test Mode Select. This pin is used for navigating through the TAP-controller.

role.name: TDO
role.desc: Test Data Out. Serial output data from Instruction register or Data Register.

role.name: TDI
role.desc: Test Data In. Serial input data to be shifted in to the Instruction Register or Data Register (Scan Chains).

role.name: OC1B
role.desc: Output compare matchB output. The pin can serve as an external output for the Timer/Counter1 output compareB. The OC1B pin is also the output pin for the PWM mode timer function.

role.name: INT2
role.desc: External Interrupt source 2 to the MCU.
